response.original_title: Anima Mundi Brasil: Amor e Ódio
response.overview: The passage of time and our emotions are themes narrated in four animations, which show us the clash of feelings between a fisherman, a businessman and a disillusioned dog. SERIES SYNOPSIS: Check out the facets of animation in techniques such as rotoscoping, pencil on paper, painting in time, live filming, stopmotion and computing. The short films were selected from the Anima Mundi Festival collection.
response.title: Anima Mundi Brasil: Amor e Ódio
